thread.section_title: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group | printpps.com
thread.title: ashley
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by ashley

author: ashley
title: ashley
text:
Great customer service, received the note pads we custom ordered in exactly the time we needed it. The rep on the phone assured us the process and it played out great. The note pads look perfect and they were packaged well.
Will use them in the future for more stuff!
